<MethodEndpoint

Provided a URL, converts any microdata found on that URL to JSON-LD.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"u","in":"query","description":"The web page URL","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  body={undefined}
>
